text:
Hello guys! :wave: :wave:
Did you ever had a specific problem with GA4 that was not collecting the session data only on specific subpages under your domain in HubSpot?
I have the same GTM setup everywhere and all the blog posts are sharing the same template and on some of the blog posts GA4 shows 0 sessions data while sessions/page views are seen in HubSpot. It happens also on some other subpages but they also have the same <header> tag as the rest.
Any reason that could cause this?
Has anyone tried to run a GPT customer-facing chatbot through HubSpot chatflows?

Hi guys ! I hope my message finds you well ! My question is pretty simple ! How can i add an image file to a folder like shown in the image ? the options that appear when choosing the type of file don't match what I am looking for
Instead of clicking create new file you need to click upload file
Thank you Federico !!! So much appreciated
Hi again ! How could I export a theme into zip file please?

Hello, I want to add a HubDB filter but it needs to be an input text field and for each time there is a new letter in it should be filtered but with a wildcard.

the module also had pagination so it needs to work with the current pagination.

I want to filter the hubdb on partitail words so an example could be  title="this is a test item"

the search "this" should give back every item that contains "this" in the title row in the hubdb
Hello, does anyone have any resources to get realistic dummy data for tickets - the HubSpot generator is just deals, tickets, contacts and companies

Hello
Please advise how to add a CTA field in custom module
  {{ module.cta_explore }} and {% module.cta_explore %}  are not working for me
You can just go over the module field and click "Copy snippet" to get a working snippet of that field

Hi!
I'm facing some issue with a custom coded action. The CCA correctly outputs a number `{"amount":50}` but it seems that number can't be used to update the default Deal `amount` with the action Copy property value

Anyone has ever faced issue in updating deal amount in that way?
I asked this in <#CSFGKSHT7|themes>, but thought maybe someone could help me here.

the drag and drop areas in code are just the default content. It will get overriden by the user via the page editor. The only way to restore it back is to rename the drag and drop area and give it a different “ID”

Hi all, can anyone advise how to do below:
1. I do the data analysis work and we are using HubSpot
2. We have our own database where I collect data from various sources
3. I hope to collect data from HubSpot (maybe every data) and keep syncing to MySQL database
Hey everyone! Is it possible to set up an intranet using HubSpot? Is so, can anyone help me with this? TIA!
